attributes.action: I want to raise a vote of no confidence in HM Government
attributes.additional_details: IDS has resigned stating his concerns that the poor and disabled are being systematically hounded financially to bare the brunt of the financial deficit, whilst the government  give tax breaks to the super rich
attributes.background: The treatment of the poor and disabled is biased and unjustified and clearly after the statement by Ian Duncan Smith proof that were not all in this together
